metaTags.title: Selection Process: Come be a part of Zenith || Zenith EESC
metaTags.description: Every year we open a Selection Process to recruit new members. Be a part in the Selection Process and help us to conquer the Space!

processoSeletivoHero.title: Selection Process
processoSeletivoHero.subtitle: Would you like to be a part of Zenith Aerospace?

processoSeletivoCard1.title: How to participate?
text: Every year we open a selection process to recruit new members.
Unfortunately, we can't accept everyone, so we must have a selection process.
Undergraduate students from USP São Carlos, UFSCar and IFSP can participate in our selection process and */no/* previous knowledge is needed!
*/Interested?/* Check out if our selection process is open.

processoSeletivoCard2.title: Timeline
processoSeletivoCard2.detail: We're looking forward to meeting our new members this year. To participate, fill in the */Google Forms/* below and follow us in our */Social Networks/* to be notified when the results come out!.

processoSeletivoCard3.title: Selection Process Parts
text: In this phase, the candidates will be divided in */groups/* and exposed to a */problem-situation/* inspired by real space missions. We will evaluate the candidate's affinity with */teamwork/*, */leadership/* predisposition and */creativity/* when facing a problem.

In the 2nd phase, covering one month's span, the remaining candidates will be again organized into */groups/*, aiming to */work together/* on developping, helped by a */Zenith/* member, a solution to a proposed problem, with */real world applications/* in the design and use of probes and sattelites.
